mapper.select: select wtjycssqmxb.wtdh, wtjycssqmxb.wtxh, wtjycssqmxb.wtsqxh, wtjycssqmxb.csxm, wtjycssqmxb.csbz, wtjycssqmxb.bzsm, wtjycssqmxb.jyjg, wtjycssqmxb.wjmc, wtjycssqmxb.wjlj, wtjycssqmxb.csz, wtjycssqmxb.cjrm, wtjycssqmxb.cjrq, wtjycssqmxb.yqjq, wtjycssqmxb.psjq, wtjycssqmxb.clrm, wtjycssqmxb.psbj, wtjycssqmxb.psrm, wtjycssqmxb.csjg, wtjycssqmxb.pssj, wtjycssqmxb.jjcd, wtjycssqmxb.jybj, wtjycssqmxb.jysj, wtjycssqmxb.jyrm from wtjycssqmxb where wtjycssqmxb.wtdh=#{wtdh}

mapper.update: update wtjycssqmxb set wtdh = #{wtdh}, wtxh = #{wtxh}, wtsqxh = #{wtsqxh}, csxm = #{csxm}, csbz = #{csbz}, bzsm = #{bzsm}, jyjg = #{jyjg}, wjmc = #{wjmc}, wjlj = #{wjlj}, csz = #{csz}, cjrm = #{cjrm}, cjrq = #{cjrq}, yqjq = #{yqjq}, psjq = #{psjq}, clrm = #{clrm}, psbj = #{psbj}, psrm = #{psrm}, csjg = #{csjg}, pssj = #{pssj}, jjcd = #{jjcd}, jybj = #{jybj}, jysj = #{jysj}, jyrm = #{jyrm} where = #{}
